= Sample Class =
{{{
    public class Customer
    {
        private int _id;
        private string _firstName;
        private string _lastName;
        private string _phoneNumber;
        private List<Order> _orders;

        public int Id
        {
            get { return this._id; }
            set { this._id = value; }
        }

        public string FirstName
        {
            get { return this._firstName; }
            set { this._firstName = value; }
        }

        public string LastName
        {
            get { return this._lastName; }
            set { this._lastName = value; }
        }

        public string PhoneNumber
        {
            get { return this._phoneNumber; }
            set { this._phoneNumber = value; }
        }
    }
}}}

Get an instance of a serializer for this class.
{{{
   // customer
   Customer customer = new Customer();
   customer.Id = 1;
   customer.FirstName = "Bob";
   customer.LastName = "Smith";
   customer.PhoneNumber = "(222)444-9987";
   Serializer serializer = Serializer.GetSerializer(typeof(Customer));
   string result = serializer.Serialize();
   Console.WriteLine(result);
}}}

The output should look something like this:
{{{
/*
  Created by JsonExSerializer
  Assembly: Samples, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null
  Type: Sample01.Customer
*/
{
    "Id":1,
    "FirstName":"Bob",
    "LastName":"Smith",
    "PhoneNumber":"(222)444-9987"
}
}}}
